title: Game 7 Drama in Miami
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss game 7 of the Eastern Conference Finals. Jimmy Butler’s missed three spelled the end for the Heat as they dropped game 7 at home to the Celtics, find out if Boston’s vaunted defense can do enough to slow down the Warriors’ dynamic ball movement and lights-out shooting. PLUS – the Lakers got their man in Darvin Ham. Jalen explains how critical Ham was to Milwaukee’s success and why the Lakers felt like he would be a difference maker for them. Also, CeeDee Lamb says he’s ready to be “that guy” for the Cowboys – question is: do Jalen and Jacoby agree? Find out the answer. All that and more on the Jalen and Jacoby podcast.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
